182951037637803370.Text: Two smaller but dangerous predators of Vvardenfell are the nix-hound and the rat. Cave rats are found everywhere, often in close proximities to their slightly larger relative, the cave rat and the rust rat  The nix-hound is a rangy quadruped with long, purple feeding spikes. Its cousin, the rogue nix-hound, is larger and much more dangerous.

3843120242447521497.Text: Two smaller but dangerous predators of Vvardenfell are the nix-hound and the waste rat. Cave rats are found everywhere, often in close proximities to their slightly larger relative, the cave rat and the rust rat  The nix-hound is a rangy quadruped with long, purple feeding spikes. Its cousin, the rogue nix-hound, is larger and much more dangerous.
